title: So much Fiora hate here recently.
body:
Reworked Fiora is a lot more interesting and fun than old Fiora could ever dream to be.

Prove me wrong.

Near when I started this game, Fiora was the second champion I mained (first was Master Yi), and for a while, too on my way to levelling up to 30.  But after some time had passed, I grew tired of the same Q>Q>R gameplay and her being such a feast or famine character.

When ahead, she won everything through bullshit R cancer, and when she was behind, she was more useless than fucking Urgot.

PROVE.  ME.  WRONG.
